replies.bodyText: Yes, we need to filter out .d.ts (not 100% sure if it should ever work, but it doesn't work at the moment). A hack I used to produce parsing stats is to treat .d.ts as the extension of foo.d.ts. I think it violates the usual meaning of "extension". Applying a more generic filter on file names seems like a proper solution here.
replies.author: mjambon
